metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1084 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
corosync before version 2.4.4 is vulnerable to an integer overflow in exec/totemcrypto.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1084` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

corosync - 2.4.3-0ubuntu1.1
corosync-notifyd - 2.4.3-0ubuntu1.1
corosync-qdevice - 2.4.3-0ubuntu1.1
corosync-qnetd - 2.4.3-0ubuntu1.1
libcfg6 - 2.4.3-0ubuntu1.1
libcmap4 - 2.4.3-0ubuntu1.1
libcorosync-common4 - 2.4.3-0ubuntu1.1
libcpg4 - 2.4.3-0ubuntu1.1
libquorum5 - 2.4.3-0ubuntu1.1
libsam4 - 2.4.3-0ubuntu1.1
libtotem-pg5 - 2.4.3-0ubuntu1.1
libvotequorum8 - 2.4.3-0ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: corosync package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.3-0ubuntu1.1').
